abstract: Returns a media selection option associated with the receiver in a given group.
overview:
## Return Value

A media selection option associated with the receiver in `mediaSelectionGroup`, or `nil` if none were found.

## Discussion

Audible media selection options often have associated legible media selection options; in particular, audible options are typically associated with forced-only subtitle options with the same locale. See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaCharacteristic/containsOnlyForcedSubtitles] for a discussion of forced-only subtitles.

# associatedMediaSelectionOption(in:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a media selection option associated with the receiver in a given group.

## Declaration

```swift
func associatedMediaSelectionOption(in mediaSelectionGroup: AVMediaSelectionGroup) -> AVMediaSelectionOption?
```

## Parameters

- **mediaSelectionGroup**: A media selection group in which an associated option is to be sought.

## Return Value

A media selection option associated with the receiver in `mediaSelectionGroup`, or `nil` if none were found.

## Discussion

Audible media selection options often have associated legible media selection options; in particular, audible options are typically associated with forced-only subtitle options with the same locale. See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaCharacteristic/containsOnlyForcedSubtitles] for a discussion of forced-only subtitles.
title: associatedMediaSelectionOption(in:)
